name: THE CARS
description:
Look at the cars drive through the storm of eternal suffering and great pain, this will leave you at ease and comfortable with your own life in return. If you for some reason are not satisfied with the cars behaviour you can push arrow keys or wasd until your satisfaction is restored.

And as all of my games this one is about life and how to cope with things. How to sit at your computer all day and then move over to the sofa and sit at the tv all night and still be comfortable and satisfied with things.Forever we sink in to the darkness of our selves. Perhaps some times we should just try another route.

Look at the cars.
Perhaps the gif is better than the game.
